resources.description: Get personalized recommendations for exercises, music, and journaling prompts.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Connect with peers in a safe, anonymous forum to share experiences.

appointments.description: Book confidential sessions with professional counselors at your convenience.

breathing.title: Breathing
breathing.description: Access a library of breathing exercises and relaxation techniques to find calm.

groove.title: Mood Groove
groove.description: Use your camera to get instant feedback on your current emotional state.

music.title: Music Therapy
music.description: Receive AI-curated Indian music playlists based on your self-assessment scores.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from students who found support and hope through MindCare.

1.quote: The anonymous forum is a lifesaver. It feels so good to know I'm not the only one going through this. Meeting other people on this platform gave me the courage to share my own.
1.author: Anonymous Student

2.quote: I was hesitant to try the AI chat, but it was surprisingly helpful. It gave me some great coping strategies that I needed them. It's like having a supportive friend available 24/7.
2.author: Anonymous Student

3.quote: Booking a session with a counselor was so easy and completely confidential. I was worried about the stigma, but this platform made taking the first step towards getting professional help feel safe.
3.author: Anonymous Student

crisisHelp.title: In Crisis? Help is Available.
crisisHelp.description: If you are in immediate distress, please don't hesitate to reach out. Our crisis helplines provide confidential, free support 24/7.

footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This platform is for support and not a substitute for professional medical advice. In a crisis, please contact a helpline.
